pages.text: $(li)A Large Jack o'Lantern Slice is the $(l:patchouli:decoration/autumnity/large_jack_o_lanterns_slice)Large Jack'o Lantern Slice$(/l) $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/redstone_lamp)Redstone Lamp$(/l) version.$(br)$(li)Like the $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/redstone_lamp)Redstone Lamp$(/l), this one can only be turned on with a redstone signal.
pages.title: L. Redstone Jack L...

pages.text: $(li)You can place four Large Redstone Jack Lanterns to create this big pumpkin with a smile face.
